name: cyclejs-test
author: Eryk Napierala
description: Utility for testing applications based on CycleJS framework.

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run mocha
scripts.dist: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run compile; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run compile; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run compile; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
